00063 /** 
00064  * write a string to the log in KATATMP/logs. if DEBUG<0 logentries that have KATA_DEBUG are not written.
00065  * 
00066  * @param string $what string to write to the log
00067  * @param int $where log-level to log (default: KATA_DEBUG)
00068  */
00069 function writeLog($what, $where = KATA_DEBUG) {
00070     $logname = 'error';
00071     if (is_numeric($where)) {
00072         if ((DEBUG < 0) && (KATA_DEBUG == $where)) {
00073             return;
00074         }
00075         if (KATA_DEBUG == $where) {
00076             $logname = 'debug';
00077         }
00078         elseif (KATA_PANIC == $where) {
00079             $logname = 'panic';
00080         }
00081     } else {
00082         $logname = basename($where);
00083     }
00084 
00085     kataMakeTmpPath('logs');
00086     $h = fopen(KATATMP . 'logs' . DS . $logname . '.log', 'a');
00087     if ($h) {
00088         fwrite($h, date('d.m.Y H:i:s ') . $what . "\n");
00089         fclose($h);
00090     }
00091 }

00134 /**
00135  * Gets an environment variable from available sources.
00136  * env() knows what to do if $_SERVER/$_ENV are not available.
00137  *
00138  * @param  string $key Environment variable name.
00139  * @return string Environment variable setting.
00140  */
00141 function env($key) {
00142     if ($key == 'HTTPS') {
00143         if (isset ($_SERVER) && !empty ($_SERVER)) {
00144             return (isset ($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on');
00145         } else {
00146             return (strpos(env('SCRIPT_URI'), 'https://') === 0);
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     if (isset ($_SERVER[$key])) {
00151         return $_SERVER[$key];
00152     }
00153     elseif (isset ($_ENV[$key])) {
00154         return $_ENV[$key];
00155     }
00156     elseif (getenv($key) !== false) {
00157         return getenv($key);
00158     }
00159 
00160     // fallback
00161     if ($key == 'DOCUMENT_ROOT') {
00162         $offset = 0;
00163         if (!strpos(env('SCRIPT_NAME'), '.php')) {
00164             $offset = 4;
00165         }
00166         return substr(env('SCRIPT_FILENAME'), 0, strlen(env('SCRIPT_FILENAME')) - (strlen(env('SCRIPT_NAME')) + $offset));
00167     }
00168 
00169     // fallback
00170     if ($key == 'PHP_SELF') {
00171         return str_replace(env('DOCUMENT_ROOT'), '', env('SCRIPT_FILENAME'));
00172     }
00173 
00174     return null;
00175 }
